channel.title: Lol need full client help please
channel.description:
im a little new to doing clients so.. i need a lil help of doing image ect and making it work ect like how i code it all, well basially i only want to know how to code/make a client with my image ;D please reply and help me
O and also how to make/add custom items to my client!!!!
yours sincerely Nathanjake2(future client maker)

item.title: Lol need full client help please
item.dc:creator: @EatU4Dinner EatU4Dinner
item.description:
@EatU4Dinner wrote:

take the image thats in there, open it in paint or whatever program you use, and edit away. if you wanna make a good one with like banner making programs, then it has to be a certain size which i dont know off the top of my head. then cut it in half and reverse 1 side. theres a tutorial out there cuz i just read 1 a little bit ago.

Read full topic
item.source: Lol need full client help please
